docs.text: Personal website My personal website is built using nuxt3.js Pre-requisites Install nvm $ curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.1/install.sh | bash Then open a new terminal and type: $ nvm install node Install Open a terminal and type: npx nuxi init project_dir Use the documentation from [here][https://tailwindcss.com/docs/guides/nuxtjs] to: $ npm install -D tailwindcss postcss@latest autoprefixer@latest @nuxt/postcss8 $ npx tailwindcss init Modify nuxt.config.js to include the following setup: export default { buildModules: [ '@nuxt/postcss8', // ... ], build: { postcss: { plugins: { tailwindcss: {}, autoprefixer: {}, }, }, } } Install content $ npm install --save-dev @nuxt/content
docs.title: Personal website

docs.text: My personal website is built using nuxt3.js

docs.text: Install nvm $ curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.1/install.sh | bash Then open a new terminal and type: $ nvm install node
docs.title: Pre-requisites

docs.text: Open a terminal and type: npx nuxi init project_dir Use the documentation from [here][https://tailwindcss.com/docs/guides/nuxtjs] to: $ npm install -D tailwindcss postcss@latest autoprefixer@latest @nuxt/postcss8 $ npx tailwindcss init Modify nuxt.config.js to include the following setup: export default { buildModules: [ '@nuxt/postcss8', // ... ], build: { postcss: { plugins: { tailwindcss: {}, autoprefixer: {}, }, }, } } Install content $ npm install --save-dev @nuxt/content
docs.title: Install

docs.text: Bastion Bastion is a tool to handle connections between an user and a set of resources. It allows to split ssh connections in two: * Ingress: User -> Bastion * Egress: Bastion -> Instance This allows to control who access which resource. You can find more info about setup in their github repository .
docs.title: Bastion

docs.text: Overview SIM Card Turkey provides 4G and 5G connectivity almost everywhere. Check here Turk Telecom Vodafone Turkcell Health Insurance I've handled the process with Yabangee, they provide easy communication to apply for Sompo Sigorta health insurance. The price is 1248TL (33yo, Spanish). Checking Sompo Sigorta Price Inquiry shows 480TL, but i wasn't able to contact them by email. Residence Permit Coming soon ...

docs.text: I've handled the process with Yabangee, they provide easy communication to apply for Sompo Sigorta health insurance. The price is 1248TL (33yo, Spanish). Checking Sompo Sigorta Price Inquiry shows 480TL, but i wasn't able to contact them by email.
docs.title: Health Insurance

docs.text: General Info Train Company: TCDD Destinations Sofia <-> Istanbul Don't book with Metro. Last time i've booked with Panorama . Bus was confortable and price was around 20€. It departed at 9pm from Altıntepsi, 34035 Bayrampaşa/İstanbul, Turquía and you can reach by metro. Istanbul -> Ankara By train it tooks around 5h. Train provide WIFI, bar and places to eat/work. Reservations must be done with enough time because usually is full.
docs.title: Travel
